subject: Supporting plant-based catering for council events

bodyConfig.opening_paragraph: I am writing as your constituent to express my support for switching council catering to plant-based options. I understand this decision will be made in March 2026.
later_paragraphs: Research from Oxford University has found that plant-based diets are not only more sustainable but can also be more cost-effective than conventional diets.
Animal agriculture is a significant contributor to climate change, deforestation, and biodiversity loss. Plant-based foods require substantially less land, water, and energy to produce.
Given Edinburgh's Net Zero 2030 target, I believe the council should consider all available opportunities to reduce emissions, including changes to catering practices.
Edinburgh has a strong plant-based food culture, from established restaurants to catering businesses. The council would be well-positioned to source high-quality, varied plant-based menus locally.
